## ContextMenu.callbackFactory() function

Create a callback function that creates and configures a block, then places the new block next to the original.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function callbackFactory(block: Block, xml: Element): Function;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | [Block](./blockly.block_class.md) | Original block. |
|  xml | Element | XML representation of new block. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Function

Function that creates a block.
